title: Rainy city street with multiple braking events, the ego vehicle is moving slowly.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy city street with multiple braking events.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is moving slowly to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It slows down and brakes frequently to avoid potential accidents caused by the slippery road.
